message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the most I can go.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,800 is too low for me. How about $11,200?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $11,200. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $11,000?
